description: This is a Dart source file defining a Flutter widget for the 'Orders Overview' screen tailored for a manager in a meal ordering platform. It includes UI components such as app bar, headers, notes, and utilizes custom themes and responsiveness.

classes.name: ManagerOrdersOverviewScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the manager's orders overview screen, displaying a scaffold with header and notes.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A private stateless widget that renders a styled header with a title, icon, and color.

classes.name: _Note
classes.description: A private stateless widget that displays a note or placeholder text inside a decorated container.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each of the classes, constructing the UI components based on Flutter widgets.
